name: A Grand Show - Sandbox Demo
description:
Music used under CC BY-SA 3.0 obtained from Open Game Art.

Arcade Soundtrack By hanzlab

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

X (Jump), C (Blue Star), V (Red Star), S (Aim Forward-Up) , D (Aim Forward-Down)

ARROW KEYS

Controller (Xbox)

A (Jump), X (Blue Star), B (Red Star), Left Shoulder (Aim Forward-Up), Right Shoulder (Aim Forward-Down)

Would highly recommend using a controller if you have one!

A Grand Show is a platformer featuring a "Push/Pull" mechanic. This is a small sandbox demo featuring various types of moving/rotating* platforms and some sandbag enemies to mess with! This is more of a "proof of concept" demo then anything, but I hope you enjoy it!

Note: The rotating platforms are Barely Functional, I need to work on them more at some point but for now, they just Work (Barely).

Second Note: The numbers in the top left are the FPS! Shouldn't have any problems with it but let me know if there's any!

VERSION 1.2 - 1/28/2017

-Fixed slight bug with star controls.

VERSION 1.1 - 1/25/2017

-Changed how star gained momentum works - Values are SET rather then ADDED, meaning much more reliable speeds.

-Slight graphical tweaks.

(Update, about 20 minutes after upload: Changed speeds again, horizontal speed is additive, vertical speed is set. Feels better I think.)
